name: Pure Football 2018
description: Pure Football 2018 is an American Football Simulator where you play GM, Coach, and Player. Play through endless seasons as you master player contracts, assembling your coaching staff, free agency, and the draft. Lead your players come game time or use the advanced game simulation system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 3 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible with at least 1.5 GB of video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 3 GB available space
